title: Carbohydrate-active enzyme (CAZyme) Discovery and Engineering via (Ultra)High-throughput Screening

Carbohydrate-active enzymes (CAZymes) constitute a diverse set of enzymes that catalyze the construction, degradation, and modification of carbohydrates. These enzymes have been fashioned into potent, selective catalysts by millennia of...
